DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa.  Marijuana contains cannabinoids, substances with hallucinogenic, psychoactive, and addictive properties.  This agent has potential use for treating cancer pain and cachexia. (NCI04)_Marijuana rolled in the outer leaves of a cigar or hidden in a hollowed-out cigar._To put into action or service._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa.  Marijuana contains cannabinoids, substances with hallucinogenic, psychoactive, and addictive properties.  This agent has potential use for treating cancer pain and cachexia. (NCI04)_Marijuana rolled in the outer leaves of a cigar or hidden in a hollowed-out cigar._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Property.preferredDefinition: Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have you ever smoked part or
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you ever smoked part or all of a traditional cigar, cigarillo or filtered cigar with marijuana in it?
